name: Caldera
description: A massive volcanic caldera forms a natural amphitheater, often containing a lake or fertile soil. The steep walls provide excellent defense, but the enclosed space can become a death trap if the volcano reactivates.
atmosphere: Vast bowl-shaped world with steep walls like natural ramparts. Massive amphitheater carved by ancient fire. Enclosed nature amplifies sounds with earth echoes. Fertile soil supports lush vegetation. Still, heavy air scented of rich soil and volcanic minerals.
